# 𓋚 Atef crown

𓄿 𓏏 𓆑 𓋚 | Atef crown | Athen?
𓄿 𓏏 𓆑 𓅂 | Atef-crown |
𓄿 𓏏 𓆑 𓅱 𓁕 | Atef crown |
𓄿 𓏏 𓆑 | be crowned| թագ tʿag tāg@Parthian 𐫟𐫀𐫡𐫤𐫀𐫃 xʾrtʾg /xārtāg/ “crown of thorns” PIE ˢteg- “to cover” (versteck)
𓄿 𓏏 𓆑 | be crowned| تاج tac תגא tāgā (trick) attire: עֲטָרָה 'atará עטרה atore ⇔ Tuch تاج a'táj ताज tāj тид tid таж taž
𓄿 𓏏 𓆑 | be crowned| עֲטָרָה 'atará < כֶּתֶר kéter(a) כּתר (keser) caser Kaiser?
𐫤𐫀𐫃 (tʾg, “crown”.
𓄿 𓏏 𓆑 ⋍ עֲטָרָה 'atará תגא tāgā ⇔ tragen :

𓏏 𓍯 𓄿 𓂡 | hold up | tragen
𓏏 𓍯 𓄿 𓀘 | support, sustain | tragen ⋍ dargben ^^ +++
𓎛 𓇉 | carry off (captives) | tragen 3

*(s)teg- “to cover”
https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/(s)teg-
